channel.title: LIVING – Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE
channel.description: Luxury Home Furniture Designs in UAE

item.title: Jersey Tv Unit
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Accented by cool, creamy veneer and brushed bronze detail, the Jersey TV Unit boasts a unique contrast of intricate nuances and bold minimalism. Elegantly proportioned with a barely-there silhouette, this piece is fabulously extravagant in its sculptural simplicity.

The post Jersey Tv Unit appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded: The post Jersey Tv Unit appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: Cataleya Tv Stand
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 5TH OCTOBER

Luxurious lines, a softly curved silhouette and gorgeous scallop accents, the Cataleya TV Stand truly captures the essence of luxury living. Its sweeping diorama of grain topped with an expansive veined marble top is unequivocally suave, enhancing the definition and distinction of any home.

The post Cataleya Tv Stand appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded: The post Cataleya Tv Stand appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: Renee
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
This whimsical piece has the air of retro chic to it. Textile upholstery in hues that ranges from mustard, aqua and blush to shades of chrome, Renee is rather individualistic and exudes a groovy vintage vibe.

The post Renee appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
FRAME IN PINE WOOD + PLYWOOD.
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC.
SWIVEL SYSTEM BASE IN 304# STAINLESS STEEL IN BRUSHED GOLD

The post Renee appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: Cruz bar table
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER

The Cruz Bar Table rises to every occasion. Anchored by an elegant trumpet base, slender and staggered columns of brushed brass support a beautifully bevelled round top of white marble. Elegant and industrial, pair this piece with matching bar chairs, or mix and match for an eclectic flair.

The post Cruz bar table appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
BRASS+GOLD

The post Cruz bar table appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: Monterosa chair
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Body Frame In Eucalyptus + Pine Wood + Plywood. 304# Stainless Steel With Shining Champagne Gold Color. Swiveling Chair. Diamond Quilting Design On The Sofa Outer Backrest. Fully Upholstered In Fabric

The post Monterosa chair appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
Body Frame In Eucalyptus + Pine Wood + Plywood.
304# Stainless Steel With Shining Champagne Gold Color.
Swiveling Chair.
Diamond Quilting Design On The Sofa Outer Backrest.
Fully Upholstered In Fabric

item.title: PRADA SOFA SET
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
DELIVERY BY 29TH OCTOBER

A quintessential Chesterfield upholstered in leather with deep button tufting and rolled arms. Postured atop a svelte brushed gold exposed frame, the 4-piece Prada collection pushes the boundaries in its traditional design with an elegant, contemporary twist.

The post PRADA SOFA SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
BODY FRAME IN SOLID BEECH WOOD.
FEATHER BEANS FIBER SILICONE’S.
LEGS IN 304# STAINLESS STEEL IN MATT GOLD

The post PRADA SOFA SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: VELAR SOFA SET
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
A protagonist to complement any living space, the floor-hugging Velar is beyond just aesthetic appeal. Enveloped in velvety-soft upholstery on antique gold finished legs, this luxuriously comfortable sofa set also reclines into blissful indulgence.

The post VELAR SOFA SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
BODY FRAME IN SOLID BEECH WOOD.
FEATHER BEANS FIBER SILICONES IN CUSHIONS.
FULLY UPHOLSTERED IN FABRIC .
LEGS IN VINTAGE GOLD FINISH.

The post VELAR SOFA SET appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.

item.title: TIFANY SWIVEL CHAIR + OTTOMAN
item.dc:creator: Huzaifa
item.description:
Defined by its elegant lines and classic silhouette, the timeless Tifany Swivel Chair and Ottoman brings retro glam to any room. Draped in suede-like fabric with a tall wrap-around back and plush seat, it draws you into a comforting embrace.

(Please note that Chair Blue is coming with Ottoman Blue Color)

The post TIFANY SWIVEL CHAIR + OTTOMAN appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
item.content:encoded:
Body Frame in Pine Wood.

Fully Upholstered in Fabric.

Legs in 304# Stainless Steel in Black Matt.

The post TIFANY SWIVEL CHAIR + OTTOMAN appeared first on Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE.
